Discover myHAVEN â€“ Your Personal Internet!

Streamlining your digital life is what myHAVEN does best. Forget about juggling multiple lists, tags, and filters across various apps and files. With myHAVEN, all your interests, needs, and desires are securely consolidated into one private, anonymous space. Designed for the intention economy, myHAVEN simplifies your digital interactions by aligning content and communications with your true intentions, making your online experience more efficient and enjoyable while safeguarding your privacy.

Centrally Capture and Organize Your Daily Intentions
myHAVEN helps you collect and categorize your wants, needs, and desires in a secure and private manner wherever you go, anonymously and privately.

Easily Start Your Journey with Our Secure App
Begin your journey towards a more intentional and private online experience with myHAVEN's secure platform.

INTENTIONIZE! Curate and Centralize Your Intentions
With myHAVEN, you can easily curate and centralize your online activities, transforming them into personalized, private catalogs of your intentions.

Engage Merchants Discreetly with Real-time Personal Alignments
Communicate and align with merchants based on your intentions, all while maintaining your privacy.

Discover, Align, and Share Intentions through Advisor Portals
Explore new possibilities and share your interests securely through myHAVEN's Advisor Portals.

Communicate Securely with Permission-based Messaging
No more spam! Enjoy secure and permission-based messaging tailored to your preferences.

Leverage AI to Catalog and Protect Your Intentions
Use advanced AI tools to help catalog your activities and protect your intentions online and in the real world.

Why Choose myHAVEN?
In today's digital age, our online identities are more valuable than ever. Every interaction, every click, and every share contributes to a digital profile that can be exploited by others for profit. Data brokers collect vast amounts of personal information, often without our consent, and sell it to the highest bidder. This not only invades our privacy but also increases the risk of identity theft and financial fraud.

Take Control of Your Digital Identity
With myHAVEN, you regain control over your digital footprint. Our platform ensures that your activities are intentionized and kept private and anonymous. By switching to myHAVEN, you can:

- Enhance Your Privacy: Ensure that your personal data remains confidential and secure.
- Maintain Your Permissions: Control who has access to your information and under what conditions.
- Exercise Your Choice: Navigate the digital world according to your values and preferences, free from unwanted surveillance and data exploitation.

Stay Anonymous While Engaging Online
myHAVEN ensures complete anonymity, unlike a VPN which only masks your computer's identity. With myHAVEN, you can engage without ever revealing your personal details. There's no need to provide your name, email, phone number, or address. Safely utilize myHAVEN's Intention Economy to share your intentions while keeping your identity private.

Stay Safe and Secure Online
Digital identities are here to stay, and so are the threats that come with them. Protect yourself by adopting a more conscious approach to your online activities. With myHAVEN, you can better protect your digital identity by remaining anonymous and keeping it from prying eyes and malicious entities.

From Attention Economy to Intention Economy
myHAVEN was designed to help pivot digital engagement away from the Attention Economy to the Intention Economy. This significant paradigm change is essential to preserving digital democracy. By focusing on users' true intentions rather than exploiting their attention, myHAVEN ensures a more ethical, respectful, and user-centric internet experience. This shift empowers individuals, respects privacy, and fosters a digital environment where democracy can thrive.

Join myHAVEN today and step into a world where your privacy, permission, and choice are always protected. Your personal internet awaits!
